name: Hvalfiskr
description: The Hvalfiskr embodies both a giant whale and a frost giant, showcasing immense size and a blend of aquatic features alongside frost giant traits.
memorable: Its Whale Song ability can charm and inflict psychic damage, creating chaos on the battlefield.
goals: To dominate the aquatic environments and assert control over other sea creatures.
relations: It might be encountered alongside other aquatic creatures or as a powerful guardian of the seas.
environment: Typically found in aquatic settings like oceans or large bodies of water.
strengths: Immunities to cold, lightning, and thunder damage, as well as to exhaustion.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to sonic-based attacks and relies on water for mobility in whale form.
attacks: Can perform Multiattack with options including Bites, Slams, and Chained Anchors, all dealing significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Whale Song, which charms and deals psychic damage to creatures within range.
senses: Has blindsight in whale form, allowing it to navigate underwater without sight.
skills: Possesses a high passive Perception score of 17, making it adept at noticing danger.
additional_information: Can transform between whale and giant forms as a bonus action.
Uses echolocation for navigation while in whale form.
Can speak to cetaceans, bridging communication with marine life.
Can hold its breath for up to 1 hour.
Ability to anchor and restrict movement through its Chained Anchor attack.
test_queries: huge whale giant creature with psychic attacks
aquatic monster that controls other sea creatures
powerful giant that can charm enemies
giant aquatic being with unique transformation
monster with strong resistances and aquatic mobility
